PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FootingTypePadFooting
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of footing. The property set can be used by the predefined type PAD_FOOTING of IfcFooting.

PropertyDef.Name: LoadBearingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum load bearing capacity of the floor structure throughtout the storey as designed.

PropertyDef.Name: IsReinforced
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the foundation is reinforced (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
